_header: In word in deed in will in thought
Subjects: carols, of women; women, praise of
_description: John Audelay, ‘Cantalena de virginibus’ — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘I pray youe maydys that here be / Kepe your state & your degre’

BodDou302.First Lines:
In word in dede in wil in þoȝtȝour maydyn hede
                    defoule ge noȝt…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…ffore þis tresoure has holpyn mone honeHit marys maydis
                    vche cuntre

Greene,  Richard Leighton.
